ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: So, when you research a spell does it have a chance of failing like other trade skills?  Is there a cap to how many points you can pump in at your guild? ...
ygData.messageBody:
So, when you research a spell does it have a chance of failing like other
trade skills? Is there a cap to how many points you can pump in at your
guild?
----- Original Message -----
From: <sdunn@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 7:17 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Research


> From: sdunn@...
>
> By any chance would anyone have found the tombs for reasearch for any of
the levels above 29? So far I've been able to get the 16th, 20th, 24, and
29th from my friendly guildmaster (and been able to verify that research
really does work!).
>
> Thanks,
> Fastus, 22 Dark Elf Wizard, The Rathe
